validationNotEmpty: The value of the '{{fieldName}}' field cannot be empty!
validationMaxLength: The value of the '{{fieldName}}' field must have a maximum of '{{maxLength}}' characters!
validationMinLength: The value of the '{{fieldName}}' field must have at least '{{minLength}}' characters!
validationMatch: The value of the '{{fieldName}}' field is invalid!
validationPasswordAndConfirmPassword: The values ​​of the 'Password' and 'Password Confirmation' fields must be the same!
